title: Loved You Always
description: "Fun, easy romance I couldn't put down." - Amazon ReviewA jilted lover, a quirky witch, and a mysterious mobster. What could possibly go wrong?EMI don’t care that my heart goes into overdrive when I’m around him. He can’t expect me to drop my steady life upside down after five years of radio silence and take him back. I’ll do whatever I can to keep him out of my life—even if I have to use magic.JEMI was an idiot to leave her without a goodbye, but I love her. I’ve always loved her, and I will fight tooth and nail to win her back. Even if that means pissing off some very dangerous people.A standalone friends to lovers, second chance novel with all the twists and turns, sweet-sexy romance, and humor Natalina Reis's books are known for.“This romcom was absolutely amazing. It was funny, spunky, creative, and totally worth the read. The plot twists that came along caught me off guard and kept me laughing. The storyline was flawless and I loved every minute of this book.” – Amazon Reviewer
author: Natalina Reis
